title: 2020 Starter HCG Diet Recipes Cookbook: Delicious Hassle Free HCG Diet Recipes That Will Get You Started on the HCG Diet
description: This cookbook is your new best friend if you are just starting the HCG diet, on the third cycle of this diet or just basically want to find out what low calorie eating is all about. HCG Diet Cookbook contains 30 popular but unique HCG Diet recipes; your breakfast, lunch and diet will never be the same as they will be full of variety and flavor.These are some things you will find • Popular meals recipe (snacks, meats, soups and salads)• Popular sauce and dressing recipes• Approved HCG smoothies and drinks• Delectable dessert recipes• Detailed instructions that are easy to follow• Estimated time for every recipeThis diet has helped many persons achieve and maintain their ideal weight. Exploring the recipes in this book you will achieve your weight loss goals.
author: Stephanie Sharp
